segments.text: I really want to make a salad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know what kind of salad that you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure what kind that I want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually make a Caesar salad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which kind of salad are you going to make ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like salads with croutons , almonds , and shredded cheese .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really like how that sounds .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you make a salad like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to do that then .
segments.speaker: S2
